personalInfo.name: Aman Jain
personalInfo.title: Full Stack Developer
personalInfo.bio: I am a passionate full-stack developer with a strong background in building modern, scalable web applications. Lets collaborate and bring your ideas to life.

projects.title: EK Chai Pilade
projects.description: A Crowd Funding Platform for chai lovers. Users can contribute to the chai fund.

projects.title: AI DIARY
projects.description: Your Personal AI-Enhanced Diary Securely capture your thoughts, reflect with AI insights, and unlock your personal growth.

projects.title: Testimonial Collector
projects.description: A web application to collect and display testimonials from users. Users can submit their feedback and view testimonials from other users.

keyResponsibilities: Implemented RESTful and GraphQL APIs using Node.js and Express.
Developed front-end applications using React and Next.js.
Integrated third-party services and APIs to enhance application functionality.
Managed project timelines and deliverables to ensure on-time completion.
Designed and developed web applications using JavaScript and React.
Built and maintained server-side APIs with Node.js and Express.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products.
Ensured applications are responsive and performant.
Participated in Agile ceremonies and contributed to project planning.

education.description: Completed a Course specialization that focused on building full-stack web applications using React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Learned best practices for designing and implementing responsive, scalable, and secure web applications.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science
education.description: Completed a comprehensive curriculum in computer science, including courses in data structures, algorithms, software engineering, and artificial intelligence. Worked on several projects, including a web application for managing student organizations and a mobile app for tracking fitness activities.

testimonials.name: Gaurav Pandey
testimonials.title: Manager
testimonials.feedback: Aman is a fantastic developer who consistently delivers high-quality work. His ability to solve complex problems is impressive.

testimonials.name: Sakshat Sachedeva
testimonials.title: Founder
testimonials.feedback: Aman is a highly skilled developer who brings a lot of value to our projects. His expertise in full stack development is top-notch.
